title: Secure, Simple, and Easy
text: This site is only available to trusted Social Profits in the community, and your contact information will be shown to others. Log on and get started, but don't forget to give back as well.

section.title: List Items
section.content: Click the '+' to add an item. This can be as broad as 'Production Equipment' or as specific as 'Label Printer'. People will be able to book your item through a form, or contact you directly.

section.title: Borrow Items
section.content: Found an item that you need? Click on it and book the item for a time through the provided form. Need to talk about more? Contact them directly through the given information.
